example.text: House Republicans voted to put parents, families, and child care providers on the chopping block in the #DefaultOnAmericaAct. Their cuts would make it extremely difficult to find affordable care. I won't quit until our budget protects working families. [[url]]

Providing school-based mental health services through the bipartisan Safer Communities Act has been crucial for our students' well-being. Democrats are prioritizing the mental health of the next generation, ensuring they have access to the support they need in school and beyond. [[url]]

Camden has made great strides in revitalizing public housing in recent years, providing families with access to quality, safe housing. These funds will aid that effort, facilitating large-scale repairs, energy efficiency upgrades and overall modernization. [[url]]

The #DefaultOnAmerica Act is not a serious bill, but legislation passed by a Republican majority in the House that would undermine the United States' ability to compete with the People’s Republic of China and advance US leadership abroad. [[url]]
